name: Around the River Bend
description:
by Caleb Noller

Float down a river, relax, and play a little guitar in this gentle boating game.

Each adjourn is unique as you wind your way through four different biomes, soaking up gentle soundscapes, and never knowing quite what's around the river bend.

An atmospheric paddle for one.

Controls

Game Controller Input

  • Paddle forward (left): Left Trigger
  • Paddle forward (right): Right Trigger
  • Paddle backward (left): Left Bumper
  • Paddle backward (right): Right Bumper
  • Play guitar: hold A
  • Toggle fullscreen: X
  • Restart: hold B
  • Exit: ESC (on keyboard)

Keyboard Input

  • Paddle forward (left): A
  • Paddle forward (right): Right Arrow
  • Paddle backward (left): D
  • Paddle backward (right): Left Arrow
  • Play guitar: hold G
  • Toggle fullscreen: F4
  • Restart: F5
  • Exit: ESC

Music by Caleb Noller
